message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it's valued at $12,000 by us. Considering its worth to you, we're extending this opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive offer tailored specifically for you, aiming to provide you with the best value while ensuring you benefit from our product's superior features. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. We look forward to serving you.
